pb138.service.facades

Interface ShipmentFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShipmentFacadeImpl

    public interface ShipmentFacade
    Facade for working with shipments;

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Shipment addShipment(long ean, Date date, int arrived)
      Creates a new shipment, does not store it in db
      List<Shipment> getAllShipments()
      Get all shipments
      Shipment storeShipmentInDb(Shipment s)
      Actually stores correctly created shipment in the db

    • Method Detail

      • addShipment

        Shipment addShipment(long ean,
                     Date date,
                     int arrived)
              throws EntityDoesNotExistException
        Creates a new shipment, does not store it in db
        Parameters:
        ean - ean of item that was shipped
        date - date when shipment arrived
        arrived - how many items arrived
        Returns:
        shipment that was created
        Throws:
        EntityDoesNotExistException - when item does not exist

      • storeShipmentInDb

        Shipment storeShipmentInDb(Shipment s)
                    throws ServiceException
        Actually stores correctly created shipment in the db
        Parameters:
        s - shipment to be stored
        Returns:
        shipment that was stored
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if something goes wrong on the db layer and service layer cannot deal with it

      • getAllShipments

        List<Shipment> getAllShipments()
        Get all shipments
        Returns:
        all shipments
